Package com.hdmstuttgart.fluffybear.controller

Class RecipeController

java.lang.Object
com.hdmstuttgart.fluffybear.controller.RecipeController
@RestController
public class RecipeController
extends java.lang.Object
Controller Class for handling recipe requests and saving/filtering/returning recipes as well as related ingredients.

  • Method Details

    • getAllRecipesByFilter

      @RequestMapping(value="/recipes/all", consumes="application/json") public java.util.List<Recipe> getAllRecipesByFilter​(@RequestHeader("breakfast") boolean breakfast, @RequestHeader("lunch") boolean lunch, @RequestHeader("dinner") boolean dinner, @RequestHeader("vegetarian") boolean vegetarian, @RequestHeader("vegan") boolean vegan, @RequestHeader("longTime") boolean longTime, @RequestHeader("shortTime") boolean shortTime)
      Handler for /recipes resource GET requests. Reads request parameters from GET request header and returns fitting recipes in the http response body.
      Parameters:
      breakfast - boolean if breakfast recipes should be considered.
      lunch - boolean if lunch recipes should be considered.
      dinner - boolean if dinner recipes should be considered.
      vegetarian - boolean if vegetarian recipes should be considered.
      vegan - boolean if vegan recipes should be considered.
      longTime - boolean if recipes with over 60 min preparation time should be considered.
      shortTime - boolean if recipes with under 30 min preparation time should be considered.
      Returns:
      recipes fitting the given query parameters.

    • getRandomRecipeByFilter

      @RequestMapping(value="/recipes", consumes="application/json") public Recipe getRandomRecipeByFilter​(@RequestHeader("breakfast") boolean breakfast, @RequestHeader("lunch") boolean lunch, @RequestHeader("dinner") boolean dinner, @RequestHeader("vegetarian") boolean vegetarian, @RequestHeader("vegan") boolean vegan, @RequestHeader("longTime") boolean longTime, @RequestHeader("shortTime") boolean shortTime)

    • getRecipe

      @RequestMapping("/recipes/{id}") public Recipe getRecipe​(@PathVariable("id") java.lang.Long id)
      Handler for /recipes/[id] resource GET requests returning a single requested recipe.
      Parameters:
      id - id for requested recipe.
      Returns:
      recipe with fitting id.

    • saveRecipe

      @PostMapping("/recipes/add") public void saveRecipe​(@RequestBody Recipe recipe)
      Handler for /recipes/add resource. Reads JSON from POST request body and adds a recipe, ingredient and fitting composite key to the database.
      Parameters:
      recipe - unmarshaled Recipe instance from request body JSON.
